A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The quote that sums up the whole movie for me is this: 

"Let the past die. Kill it\, if you have to."

They certainly killed Star Wars and the Star Wars fan in me. They totally took a steaming dump all over Luke and episodes 4/5/6/7.

I couldn't believe all the terrible plot choices. The worst part was purple-haired Holdo. If she had just told Poe what was up\, we wouldn't have had to sit through the cringe-inducing casino scene with boring Finn and Rose. Maybe they could have given us\, I don't know\, an actual lightsaber to lightsaber fight scene using that wasted time. How do you make a Star Wars movie with two lightsabers never touching? Oh that's right. Luke calls them laser swords now. Puke. Thanks for ruining Star Wars\, Disney.
